description.value:
Trigger A non-mephit creature enters the manor

Effect Raw elemental energy seeps into the Material Plane. The hazard rolls initiative.

details.description: The cracks scintillate and shift between the elemental planes, leaking perilous energy with each shift.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|name:Assemble a Seal|traits:environmental,magical] (expert) twice to assemble a seal using objects strongly grounded to the Material Plane, @Check[type:arcana|dc:26|name:Invoke Incantations|traits:environmental,magical] (trained) twice to invoke incantations to seal the cracks, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic} (4th level, counteract DC 22) to counteract the cracks.
details.routine:
(1 action) A surge of energy strikes a random non-mephit creature in the foyer. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the element of the energy surge.

1-Energy from the Plane of Air: the creature takes [[/r (2d10+3)[electricity]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Planar Cracks|traits:air,electricity] save); on a failure, the creature is pushed back 10 feet toward the entryway. The hazard gains the air and electricity traits for this round.

2-Energy from the Plane of Earth: the creature takes [[/r (2d10+3)[bludgeoning]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Planar Cracks|traits:earth] save); on a failed save, the creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}. The hazard gains the earth trait for this round.

3-Energy from the Plane of Fire: the creature takes [[/r (2d10+9)[fire]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Planar Cracks|traits:fire] save). The hazard gains the fire trait for this round.

4-Energy from the Plane of Water: the creature takes [[/r (2d10+3)[cold]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Planar Cracks|traits:water,cold] save); on a failed save, the creature's lungs fill with water, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}. The hazard gains the cold and water traits for this round.

source.value: Pathfinder Society Scenario #2-16: Freedom for Wishes
